Installation
============

You can install *azureml* on Linux, MacOS, and Windows for several interfaces. The CLI is recommended for getting started.

CLI
---

Curl:

.. code-block:: console

    % curl $TODO | bash ...

Homebrew:

.. code-block:: console

    % brew install azureml

Python
------

Pip:

.. code-block:: console

    % pip install --upgrade azureml
